name: TileReconverter-016
title: Tile Reconverter
author: Arcitos, Serialtasted
description: This mod helps keeping your inventory tidy by allowing the reconversion of decorative tiles back to their base tile (e.g. hazard concrete back to plain concrete). Press [J] to reconvert the stack of tiles you are currently holding in your cursor. This works for vanilla concrete, AsphaltRoads, MoreFloors and others.
